#Text=Improve Your Luck
#Text=Feeling a little unlucky lately ?
#Text=Want the secret to being lucky ?
#Text=You have it already - it 's you .
#Text=The secret to improving luck is about perspective , self-belief and erring on the side of optimism .
#Text=It is n't about winning huge pots of cash - it 's about making the most of the wonderful blessings already surrounding you .
#Text=See Step 1 below for some thoughts for making your own luck grow .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Prepare . " Luck is when preparation meets opportunity " , said Seneca , Roman dramatist , philosopher and politician , 5 BC - 65 AD .

column1: #Text=If you have the groundwork in place you can take advantage of the opportunities that come your way .
#Text=Be proactive .
#Text=Network .
#Text=Lucky people know people , lots of people .
#Text=They do n't have to be everyone 's bosom buddy but it is the art of being open to many new people that counts .
#Text=Practice feeling comfortable talking to strangers at events that you attend .
#Text=And actively listen to them when you strike up a conversation because you will have a lot to learn and they will remember that you appreciated what they had to say .

#Text=This can translate into opportunities ; the more people you meet and the more people you display genuine interest in , the more likelihood of you meeting the right person at the right time who has an opportunity at hand that you want to be a part of .
#Text=Trust your instincts .
#Text=That little inner voice is often right and lucky people know this .
#Text=You will also know when your " common sense " or " reason " are trying to override the lucky hunch .
#Text=When this happens , take a moment aside to sit and think things through clearly and uninterrupted .

#Text=Consider whose voices are speaking to you when you are faced with overriding intuition - is it your own trustworthy voice or is it the voices of others ' expectations - a spouse , a boss , a friend ?
#Text=Take it easy .
#Text=Anxiety and worry are enemies of luck .
#Text=They introduce a factor that says " Be very risk averse " and " Whoa there ! Hold back now !
#Text=Well , probably not , as most of us tend to whine " why do all the bad things happen to me ? !
#Text=" " I am going to help enable my luck today by helping others to be lucky today .
#Text="
#Text=If you believe in yourself and your abilities , and follow the ideas outlined above , you will be in a great position to take advantage of lucky breaks .
#Text=Use techniques such as visualization and goal-setting to create your luck .
#Text=These are not over-used mantras ; they are proven techniques to ensure that you remain directed and focused on the things you want for yourself in life .
#Text=Use your subconscious mind .
#Text=Have a total picture of the success you would like .
#Text=Bring it into mind for 3 seconds , and then leave it .
#Text=It will come true with a strong intent .
